ul.li: You must have the SECURITY_ADMIN role.
To check currently assigned role(s), select the User ID on the top right hand corner, and click View User Profile from the drop-down list. Assigned roles are displayed.

context.p: This tutorial explains how to export selected user profiles to an XML file. Up to 1,000 users can be exported to a single file. Exported file can be used to modify users profiles by using Import option. Due to security reasons the password is not exported.

ol.li:
Click Export. The Opening UserProfiles.xml window is displayed.
There is an availability to filter users with chosen attribute and then export filtered users profiles.

step.info: In the pop-up window, choose a localization to save UsersProfiles.xml.

Click OK to export the file.
For more information on Export, see Import and Export.
